author: Mental Outlaw
description:
SXWM is a window manager written in C, inspired by DWM that has an even smaller codebase than the famous suckless windows manager. Download it here
https://github.com/uint23/sxwm

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

Subscribe to me on Odysee.com
https://odysee.com/@AlphaNerd:8
